translations.skillsSubtitle: Technologies and tools mastered to deliver exceptional digital experiences
translations.projectsSubtitle: A collection of projects that demonstrate my skills and experience in different technologies and contexts
translations.projectsQwikRaffleDescription: SaaS application for online raffles developed with Qwik and TypeScript. Complete raffle management system with modern and responsive interface.
translations.projectsGrupoUdecDescription: Corporate website for Grupo UDEC, industrial services company. Modern design with contact forms and content management.
translations.projectsErconDescription: Web portal for ERCON, construction company. Responsive site with service catalog and integrated contact forms.
translations.projectsItalianosEnMiramarDescription: Cultural platform for the Italian community in Miramar. Developed with Qwik and Strapi, includes event management and cultural content.
translations.projectsCoachFabianDescription: Website for Coach Fabián Avendaño, personal fitness trainer. Complete platform with training programs, testimonials and contact system. Developed with Qwik, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
translations.projectsUrbanStyleMiramarDescription: E-commerce store for Urban Style Miramar, urban clothing brand. Built with TiendaNube platform, featuring product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.
translations.testimonialsSubtitle: What my clients say about my work
translations.contactSubtitle: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it and help bring it to life
translations.contactIntro: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just chatting about technology and web development.
translations.heroDescription: Building modern web experiences with a focus on performance, accessibility and attractive design.
translations.heroImageAlt1: Seba working on his laptop outdoors under the stars
translations.heroImageAlt2: Seba working on his laptop in the forest during the day
translations.footerDescription: Frontend Developer passionate about creating modern, high-performance web experiences. Specialized in Qwik, React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
translations.projectsGeounityDescription: Platform designed to manage debates across communities worldwide. It helps moderate conversations, organize topics, and drive collaborative decisions in real time.
translations.projectsAmpDescription: Institutional website for the Agremiación Médica Platense. Features services, news, procedures, and contact channels tailored for healthcare professionals.
